name: Toko
headline: Learn English by speaking with an AI
description:
Toko helps English learners in East Asia achieve speaking fluency. Through our mobile app, learners engage in short, realistic conversations with an AI and receive feedback on their grammar.

With over 500 topics, learners can practice real-world scenarios ranging from small talk to workplace discussions. Toko offers a low-pressure environment to help learners build up their confidence.

We make language fluency accessible to everyone - not just those with the means to meet 1:1 with a tutor.

In Taiwan (our first market), Toko is ranked top 3 in the App Store for Education!
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:education; industry:generative-ai; industry:machine-learning; industry:consumer; location:new-york

founders.name: Jen Liu, Founder
founders.description: Jen is the co-founder and CEO of Toko. Previously, she was an early engineer and product manager at Quizlet, leading teams around AI-powered learning, mobile subscriptions and international growth. She also founded Uplevel, a coach-matching concierge service. Jen graduated from MIT with a degree in Computer Science and Engineering.

founders.name: Erica Du, Founder
founders.description:
👩🏻‍💻 Co-Founder and CTO @ Toko 
👩🏻‍💼 Previously: Engineering @ Palantir, Codecademy, & Google; Research @ MIT & Cornell Tech
👩🏻‍🏫 Speaks: English, Mandarin Chinese, and Spanish

# Speak English stress-free with your personal AI tutor
# Speak English stress-free with your personal AI tutor
# Speak English stress-free with your personal AI tutor
Learn native speaker phrases and practice real-world conversation anytime, anywhere with the world’s most powerful AI tutor.
Learn native speaker phrases and practice real-world conversation anytime, anywhere with the world’s most powerful AI tutor.
[Download for iOS](https://tokotutor.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/app/apple-store/id1569893279?pt=123095106&ct=landing-en-us&mt=8>)
[Start your free 7-day trial](https://tokotutor.com/<https:/onelink.to/trytokonow>)
[Download for Android](https://tokotutor.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tokoinc.tokotutor&referrer=utm_source%3Dlanding-en-us>)
![The Toko app home screen and a conversation](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b3IjGbVkYaXts7FS1zxDAhbk4.png)
![The Toko app home screen and a conversation](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b3IjGbVkYaXts7FS1zxDAhbk4.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
Over 15 thousand 5 star reviews
Over 15 thousand 5 star reviews
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
Over the past few months, my English has improved significantly. I went from only piecing together individual words to having simple conversations fluently, and now I can confidently communicate with colleagues. It's all thanks to Toko's help.
海豹俠
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
Highly recommended! Toko gives specific suggestions for improvement word by word, sentence by sentence, something that even speaking partners or regular English teachers can't do. It's perfect for working professionals like me who have fragmented time but want to maintain and improve speaking skills without pressure.
Msmorgane
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
I recently took the FLPT exam and surprisingly achieved B2 in speaking. This really confirmed my belief that TOKO has played a major role in improving my English abilities.
Wen Ting Huang
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
I used Toko in February to help with my TOEFL speaking test, and now that I'm pursuing my Master's at MassArt in Boston since September, I find that my practice with Toko has really helped me maintain conversations with people from around the world. The practice has made me much better at keeping discussions going. Thank you so much!
潑漆的柴
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
The best English practicing app so far I’ve been used. I can’t stop using it!!
Linlin1000 
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/bfDEibv9XnEJfFs5x9nktQl17po.png)
Toko has been incredibly helpful for my speaking skills. Through regular conversation practice with Toko's AI, my speaking has improved tremendously, and I can even work on detailed grammar in my speech. It's fun and engaging to use, never boring - and compared to hiring a real speaking tutor, it's so much more affordable.
Sara Chen 陳庭

generated_description:
**Company Name: Toko**

**Mission**: Toko aims to help users learn English by engaging in conversation with an AI.

**Overview**: Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Toko started its journey in Taiwan, focusing on aiding English learners in East Asia to achieve speaking fluency. They recognized a gap in accessible language tutoring—where traditional one-on-one sessions could be cost-prohibitive. The solution? A mobile app that allows learners to practice speaking with an AI, providing instant feedback on grammar and language usage.

With over 500 topics at their disposal, Toko facilitates realistic conversations that cover a spectrum of scenarios from casual small talk to professional workplace discussions. This emphasis on real-world engagement creates a low-pressure environment, which is especially critical for building confidence among learners.

**Unique Offerings**: 
- **Personal AI Tutor**: Users can converse with an AI, receiving suggestions for grammar improvements and pronunciation corrections, similar to a traditional tutor.
- **Diverse Content**: Available topics range from career success to travel and conversational skills, all designed by expert educators.
- **Flexible Learning**: Toko allows users to dictate the flow of their learning, adjusting their pacing and even experimenting with accents.

**User Success**: Feedback from learners highlights significant improvements in their speaking abilities. Many have praised Toko for its personalized feedback, which they found even more specific than traditional tutoring methods.

**Market Presence**: In Taiwan, Toko secured a place in the top 3 education apps on the App Store, and they boast over 15,000 five-star reviews from satisfied users.

**Team and Location**: Based in New York, Toko operates with a compact team of six dedicated employees, co-founded by MIT alumni Jen and Erica, and backed by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell of Y Combinator.

**Tags**: The company encapsulates several key themes including AI-enhanced learning, education, generative AI, and machine learning.

**Website**: More details and resources can be found at [Toko's official website](https://tokotutor.com).

**Conclusion**: Toko is carving out a unique niche in the language education market by harnessing AI to provide personalized, affordable, and flexible English-learning solutions. By focusing on user confidence and real-world conversation practice, Toko positions itself as a transformative tool for English learners across the globe.
